text: Ali Abdollahzadeh (; born January 4, 1993) is an Iranian footballer who last played for Iranian club Pars Jonoubi as a defender. ==Career== ===Tractor=== On 12 June 2018, Abdollahzadeh signed a three-year contract with Tractor. ==Club career statistics== Club Division Season League Hazfi Cup Asia Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Sanat Naft Azadegan League 2014–15 19 1 0 0 - 19 1 2015–16 24 2 0 0 24 2 Iran Pro League 2016–17 32 2 2 0 32 2 2017–18 21 1 0 0 21 1 Tractor 2018–19 6 1 0 0 6 1 Career Totals 102 7 2 0 0 0 104 7 ==References== ==Other websites== * at * Ali Abdollahzadeh at Footballtehran.com Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Tractor S.C. players
title: Ali Abdollahzadeh
